title: Attachment Quiz 7

questions.text: How much independence do I need in our relationship?
choices: A lot - I need significant personal space
Moderate - balance of together and apart time
Minimal - I prefer to share most activities

questions.text: How do I feel when you need space or alone time?
choices: Okay if you communicate about it
A bit insecure but I manage it

questions.text: What's my ideal level of togetherness in our daily life?
choices: Meaningful connection a few times a week

questions.text: How do I balance my individual identity with being a couple?
choices: I blend our lives while keeping some independence
It's an ongoing process I'm working on

questions.text: What helps me feel secure when we're physically apart?
choices: Knowing when we'll see each other next

description: Learn about the ways you show and receive love.
